lead_paragraph: Americans begin their first year of war with an experience that has be-fallen every other nation in the initial stages of the struggle against Axis aggression. It is cold comfort to know that the reverses we suffer are due to the unexpectedness and treachery of the attack on our distant outposts.
abstract: ed, The war as a whole
